thread.title_full: Party leaders to clash in UTV election debate | UTV - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Party leaders to clash in UTV election debate | UTV

locations.name: northern ireland belfast derry county antrim county down county armagh county fermanagh county tyrone

text:
The leaders of the five larger parties at Stormont will debate the issues. Credit: Pacemaker The countdown is on to the first televised leaders' debate of the 2017 Northern Ireland Assembly election campaign.
DUP leader Arlene Foster, Sinn Féin’s northern leader Michelle O’Neill, UUP leader Mike Nesbitt, SDLP leader Colum Eastwood and Alliance leader Naomi Long will each set out their stall, as the public prepares to go to the polls on 2 March.
The debate between the leaders of the five larger parties at Stormont will cover a host of issues, including everything from the RHI scandal through to Brexit.
Viewers can watch it in full at 9pm on UTV.
Last updated Thu 16 Feb 2017 Politics ae17 Northern Ireland Belfast Derry County Antrim County Down County Armagh County Fermanagh County Tyrone
